The Leaderboards of Pikmin Series Challe:
"Please read before posting
Please read the rules carefully before sending.
This is a contact form that requires proof of user. The Google form is sure to provide information that can be done anonymously (defect reports, requests, vandalism reports, etc.).
If you want a reply due to a request, please enter your email address or Twitter ID (half-width alphanumeric characters including @) in the first line. In the case of Twitter, it will be DM from the administrator Twitter. It may not be delivered depending on the settings and follow-up status.
If you want to apply for user deletion due to unavoidable circumstances, please enter "Delete" in the form below and send it as it is.
We will take measures to change the user name to "anonymous" (Please note that the score itself is strongly related to the rank points of other participants and cannot be deleted).
"
(When posting a comprehensive rule such as "Team Battle"

"Conditions for binding rules
ãƒ» There should be no significant score difference due to differences in play environment such as platforms.
ãƒ» The majority of participants must be difficult enough to clear
ãƒ» It is not a binding that takes a lot of time and effort to prove or cannot be proved. "

-Images larger than 3MB are automatically compressed.

The Leaderboards of Pikmin Series Challe:
"Details of short video conditions
ãƒ» Short videos are currently being fixed. I can't upload. (2020/07/04)
ãƒ» Short videos are a mechanism for uploading videos directly to this site.
ãƒ» Pikmin 2 is usually ranked 10th or higher or required in principle for various RTAs (video sites are also acceptable)
-There is sound with appropriate sound quality, the image quality does not interfere with the recognition of game play, and there is no significant block noise or sound deviation.
-H.264 encoding with Aviutl + x264 GUI is recommended. Bit rate specification is maximum audio 128kbps, maximum file size specification maximum 40MB
ãƒ» Regardless of the model, 480p / 30fps is recommended for Pikmin 1/2, and 720p-1080p / 60fps is recommended for Pikmin 3.
ãƒ» If you have difficulty in image quality with the above settings due to long play time, please consider posting to YouTube. "

column5: Wii "Wii Play Pikmin 2"
column6: Wii U "Wii Play Pikmin 2 (DL version)" will compete in the total points of all 30 stages of 1P challenge mode. You will be able to play Challenge Mode when you get "that key" in the main story.

column5: you will compete with the total points of 13 stages where eggs appear. Eggs may not appear on some stages depending on the placement. When you break an egg

column4: Wii U "Pikmin 3" Compete with the total points of all 30 stages in mission mode (Take the giant creatures! Is counted as 1 point for each second remaining time). column5: you will compete with the total points of 15 stages in the "Collect treasure!" Category. The time bonus is 30 points per second. Some stages are paid additional content.

column6: and 10 points per second thereafter. Some stages are paid additional content.

column4: Wii U "Pikmin 3" mission mode "Take a giant creature!" Compete with the total points of all 6 stages. Scores are counted as 1 point for each second of remaining time. The stage will be unlocked when you defeat the giant creatures in each stage of the main story.
